message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. What do you say, Bob?
Alice, your offer was tempting, but let's be realistic.  I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Think carefully, the value of the money decreases each round!
Bob, I understand your position, but let's meet in the middle.  I'm proposing a 54/46 split in my favor.  This takes into account the decreasing value of the money, and gives us both a fair share.
